org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.facilities

Class PoolThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.facilities.PoolThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PoolThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Base class for all threads in a facility thread pool. The RequestBase.call method should not be invoked from a PoolThread.

    • Nested Class Summary
